content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It's great that you're making the most of your daily commute by learning new things. Consistency is key, and it's awesome that you're committed to expanding your knowledge in machine learning and AI.

Remember, learning is a lifelong process, and it's essential to stay curious and keep learning. These books will provide you with a solid foundation in machine learning and AI, and you can always come back to them for reference.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help.

Good luck with your learning journey, and I hope you enjoy the books!
